Obedient to the direction of the angel, Ananias sought out the man who had but recently breathed out threatenings against all who believed on the name of Jesus; and putting his hands on the head of the penitent sufferer, he said, "Brother Saul, the Lord, even Jesus, that appeared unto thee 
                                                                           122
in the way as thou camest, hath sent me, that thou mightest receive thy sight, and be filled with the Holy Ghost.
